question_frame = draw_frame(content='QUESTION')
expected_output = """%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%						%
%						%
%			QUESTION		%
%						%
%						%
%						%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
"""
assert question_frame == expected_output
answer_frame = draw_frame(content='ANSWER\t')
expected_output = """%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%						%
%						%
%			ANSWER			%
%						%
%						%
%						%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
"""
assert answer_frame == expected_output
